byline: Bruce Johnson, Sarah McCammon, Sabri Ben-Achour, Gigi Douban, Alice Walker, Sam Beard, Julia Coronado, David Brancaccio and Ilya Marritz
description: The U.S. and EU kick off trade talks today, but there may be an unpleasant odor as negotiations begin: European anger about U.S. spying. Congress considers cutting food stamps from the farm bill. As FEMA updates flood maps, residents fear home insurance hikes. And Andy Murray's Wimbledon victory marks 36 years since the last British player won the title.
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, July 8, 2013
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, July 8, 2013
